results.definition: not the same one or ones already mentioned or implied
examples: the construction of highways and other public works
any other person would tell the truth
his other books are still in storage
then we looked at the other house
hearing was good in his other ear
she lived on the other side of the street from me

results.definition: very unusual; different in character or quality from the normal or expected
examples: a strange, other dimension...where his powers seemed to fail
